definition: to confirm (sth to be true)/to verify
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: The influence of electromagnetic wave on biologic respiratory process is demonstrated by an experiment.
sentences.chinese: 本文用实验证实了电磁波对生物呼吸过程的影响。

sentences.english: Perhaps this corroborates what we say.
sentences.chinese: 也许这证实了我们的说法。

sentences.english: Cor. 2:8 Therefore I exhort you to confirm your love toward him.
sentences.chinese: 林后二8所以我劝你们，要向他证实你们的爱。

sentences.english: The President refused to either confirm or deny this rumor.
sentences.chinese: 总统拒绝证实或否认这种传闻。

sentences.english: Conclusions It was proved feasibility of DNA fingerprints in the heredity monitoring of inbred strain rat.
sentences.chinese: 结论证实了该方法在近交系大鼠遗传监测中的可行性。

sentences.english: Several findings do indeed point to the importance of ESPs.
sentences.chinese: 一些研究结果的确证实了ESP的重要性。

sentences.english: When Clara becomes pregnant, it's the happiest day of their lives.
sentences.chinese: 当嘉娜证实怀孕，那他们人生中最快乐的一天。

sentences.english: The practice makes sure voice electronic mail system model based on 4-tiered architecture is viable and effective.
sentences.chinese: 实践证实了该模型的可行性和有效性。

sentences.english: This result was also confirmed by neomycin gene-containing replicons with same mutations.
sentences.chinese: 这一结果在新霉素包含子转染中也得到了证实。

sentences.english: It was proved wrong to say things like that.
sentences.chinese: 已经证实那种讲法是差池的。

sentences.english: The pictures came out AWESOME, as evidenced by my husband’s reaction.
sentences.chinese: 老公的反应证实照片实在太棒了。

sentences.english: The direct artifacts and the affirmations are sufficient.
sentences.chinese: 直接工件和访谈证实就足够了。

sentences.english: It turned out that Puck knew more English words than Prudle knew.
sentences.chinese: 成果证实帕克控制地英文单词比普鲁多更多。

sentences.english: But Agence France-Presse said the message could not be confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 不过法新社表示，这一消息尚无法证实。

sentences.english: However, whether retenes can be derived from lower organisms, such as algae is not confirmed so far.
sentences.chinese: 但藻类等低等生物可否形成惹烯却未被证实。

sentences.english: The SMEC is verified by several tests.
sentences.chinese: 经多种试验校核证实程序可信。

definition: to declare to be untrue/to deny
to make clear/to make known/to state clearly/to indicate/known
proof/certificate/identification/testimonial/CL:個|个[ge4]/to prove/to testify/to confirm the truth of
to turn out to be true/verified/true
to admit/to concede/to recognize/recognition (diplomatic, artistic etc)/to acknowledge
conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
